requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['item_id']=332589771
params['room_stock']="[{stock_date:"2018-10-31",status:1,price:322.01,stock_num:65}]"
params['sku_id']=36144305

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.item.hotel.room.update', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
